participating-org.narrative: Ministerie van Econ Zaken, Landbouw, etc

World Animal Protection (formerly known as WSPA) has been active in the field of animal welfare for over 35 years. Their aim is to protect animals around the world (Wild animals, animals in communities, livestock and animals in disaster situations). Theydo this by delivering immediate (emergency) assistance, raising awareness and lobbying for better laws and regulations. Together with supporters they put animal welfare on the agenda and work to ensure that animals are protected throughout the world.
